title: 1000 minutes per month
info: 1000 minutes of calls for 30 days at the price of 200 Afghanis. To activate M200 and to deactivate PUM200 send to 3378.

title: 1500 minutes per month
info: 1500 call minutes for 30 days at the price of 220 Afghanis. To activate M220 and to deactivate PUM220, send to 3378.
